amount_brl.description: The amount of Brazilian Reals the user wants to send.

key.description: The key to send the pix to. It can be a CPF, CNPJ, email, Brazillian mobile phone number and a random key (formatted as a UUID).

message.description: A note a user can send together with the payment. If the user wants to send a note, make sure to translate the user's message to be sent in the first person, rather than a pure copy of what the user suggests.

name: execute_trade
description: Execute a trade between two different assets.

source_asset.description: The asset the user is selling in this trade.

target_asset.description: The asset the user is buying in this trade.

amount.description: The amount the user wants to buy or sell. It can be denominated in either the source or the target asset.

input_currency.description: The currency that the user is denonimating his trade. SATS is the minimum unit of a BTC, 100 million sats equals 1 BTC.
